name: .DNL
summary: Learn about .DNL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: Unfortunately, DNAML DNL Reader and DeskTop Author are both discontinued and no longer available for purchase or download. If you still have access to these programs, you can use them to open your DNL file and view the publication it contains. Otherwise, you likely will not be able to open your DNL file.
